ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( EIL_Status__c ,"Awaiting Closure"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Fleet__c ,"E320")), OR( ISBLANK( Name), ISBLANK( Incident_Date__c), ISBLANK( Incident_Title__c), ISBLANK( Initial_Report__c ), ISBLANK( Diagram__c ), ISBLANK( Delay_Minutes__c), ISBLANK( Location__c), ISPICKVAL( Fleet__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( Leading_Half_Set__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( Trailing_Half_Set__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( TIGRE_code__c ,""), ISBLANK(EIL_Lead_Investigator__c), ISBLANK( EIL_Summary_Conclusion__c ), ISPICKVAL( Follow_Up_Actions__c, ""), ISBLANK( Follow_Up_References__c ), ISPICKVAL( Final_Attribution__c ,"") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot set to Awaiting Closure Please ensure you have completed the Supporting Data, Analysis and Closure sections
